lines.text: Wait, playing dead only works for bears and boring boys.

[getting ready to walk into a room where Tasuki and Miaka are]
Knock knock. Who's there? Kouji. Kouji who? Genro's buddy Kouji, that's who. Oh, Genro's buddy, come on in! Thank you.
Because I'm a genius and you're stupid.
Oh, I give up. I'm too exhausted to eat.
What do you mean? You've eaten eleven bowls already!
Do you know what this symbol on my forehead stands for?
My eyes are more open, the bridge of my nose is more pronounced, and my body is much more sexy. Fix this at once!
You pig! You even finished off my plate!
